code: var calculateAvgRatings=function calculateAvgRatings(reviews){var totalRating=reviews===null||reviews===void 0?void 0:reviews.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.rating;},0);var avgRating=totalRating===0?'':totalRating===1?totalRating:totalRating/((reviews===null||reviews===void 0?void 0:reviews.length)||1);return{totalRating:totalRating,avgRating:avgRating};};export default calculateAvgRatings;
